front.title: •IG-88 With Riot Gun
front.gametext: May initiate battle. Permanent weapon is riot gun (may target a character for free; draw destiny; target captured if destiny +1 > defense value). Adds one battle destiny if alone or with your other bounty hunter. Immune to Restraining Bolt and purchase.
front.lore: Bounty hunter droid equipped with proprietary stealth technology. Archived several of its enhancement subroutines in favor of sophisticated tracking and capture programming.
